Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.Action
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Action
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The class describes a single action a weapon or a power can make
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.List<Color> cost
      activation cost of the action (it can be an empty list for cost zero actions)
      private java.lang.String description
      description of the action and its effects
      private java.lang.String lambdaIdentifier
      Lambda function describing the action's effects
      private java.lang.String name
      game's action name

    • Constructor Detail

      • Action

        public Action​(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String description,
              java.util.List<Color> cost,
              java.lang.String lambdaIdentifier)
        Instantiates an Action object, setting up all the parameters
        Parameters:
        name - name of the action
        description - of the action
        cost - of the action (it can also be an empty list)
        lambdaIdentifier - id of the lambda function describing the action's effects

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute​(Player pl,
                    Map map,
                    java.lang.Object memory)
             throws ClientDisconnectedException
        Executes the action's lambda function
        Parameters:
        pl - Player who executes the action
        map - Map of the active board
        memory - Used by some actions with side effects
        Throws:
        ClientDisconnectedException - If the client disconnects

      • isFeasible

        public boolean isFeasible​(Player pl,
                          Map map,
                          java.lang.Object memory)
        Determines whether the lambda is currently feasible
        Parameters:
        pl - Lambda's player
        map - Lambda's map
        memory - Lambda's memory
        Returns:
        True if feasible, false otherwise
